name: Hank Aaron
review: The product came me used and I will be getting a full refund can cancel my prime account

name: W. H. Auden
review: I like the ease of changing the strap on my apple watch, and that is why I kept ordering for more. Will definitely recommend to others.

name: Ba Jin
review: Well I’ve only have this watch one day but everything works like new, definitely in good condition from what I can tell!

name: Francis Bacon
review: Was concerned about battery life, but it’s proving to be better than I thought. Lasts 48 hours between charges for me

name: Carl Becker
review: Works as I was looking for it to not having to open my phone to see what is who is calling or texting.

name: Roy Bean
review: It's another apple device. I love the look and it's easy to use. I am able to put app's on it and it tracks my daily exercising.
